scripts.env:client: cd client && [ ! -f .env.local ] && echo 'NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://localhost:3001' > .env.local || echo 'Client .env.local already exists'
scripts.env:server: cd server && [ ! -f .env ] && cp env.example .env || echo 'Server .env already exists'
scripts.env:setup: npm run env:server && npm run env:client
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run install:client && npm run install:server && npm run env:setup && npm run db:setup
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/node_modules client/.next server/node_modules server/dist node_modules
